Package controller

Class UpdateAppointmentController

  • java.lang.Object
    • dbConnection.JDBCConnection
      • controller.UpdateAppointmentController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CommonUseHelperIfc, javafx.fxml.Initializable
    public class UpdateAppointmentController
extends JDBCConnection
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable, CommonUseHelperIfc
    This class provides a data control flow for generating reports between the report UI and the database

        private boolean areValidInput​(java.lang.String type,
                              java.lang.String location,
                              java.lang.String title,
                              java.lang.String description,
                              java.time.LocalDate startD,
                              java.lang.String startH,
                              java.lang.String startM,
                              java.time.LocalDate endD,
                              java.lang.String endH,
                              java.lang.String endM,
                              java.lang.String contact)
        This method validates user inputs.
        Parameters:
        title - title field input
        description - description field input
        type - type field input
        location - location field input
        startD - start date field input
        startH - start hour field input
        startM - start minute field input
        endD - end date field input
        endH - end hour field input
        endM - end minute field input
        contact - a contact id
        Returns:
        boolean if all input are valid returns a ture, otherwise, returns a false.
